snippet.title: TRIPTYCH BOOK I: BLOCKHEAD --- Pre-Release Trailer (coming to Early Access 22nd January 2025!)
snippet.description:
Early Access begins on 22nd of January!!! Steam store page link below;

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2928220/Triptych_Book_I_Blockhead/

Triptych Book I: Blockhead is the 1st part of a 3 part graphical adventure game series set in an alternate version of WW1 where robotics have now begun to fight the war in place of mankind. Gameplay in book I takes place aboard a zeppelin, which the player gets to explore at their leisure - leading to action and adventure and the ultimate downfall of the last remaining airship afloat - the last airship -  the Auberon.

Will you help Pigeon and Blockhead overcome the trials and tribulations they face together?

Do birds of a feather indeed flock, together?

Join the crew of the mighty Auberon NOW and sail the unfriendly skies!

FEATURES

*4k+ ultra high definition hand painted background & cutscenes

*4-6 hours gameplay

*Luscious hand drawn pixel art & detailed animations

*Gorgeous retro OST & score

*Evolved Point & Click interface

*Non-linear gameplay

*Intuitive note taking & objective "PDA" system

*Build items using ergonomic UI

*Hair-raising adventure & intrigue!

*Colourful cast of characters!

*A vast world to explore at your own pace!
